text: Yomi Akitsu, the girl who had introduced herself as a Ryomanin.
We were led by her to the place where we were supposed to meet the masked lady.

name: Shikanosuke
text: What a strange establishment... Japanese style? No, Asian style?

name: Hebiko
text: Private rooms, really feels like a hideout. Maybe Hebiko doesn't hate it.

name: Me
text: Looks like even a city like this has a culture of enjoying food. And so there are chefs who made a business out of it... Where there's people, there's food, I guess?
As I was contemplating that, the door opened and the Masked Madam walked in.

name: Masked Madam
text: I heard about your misfortune. Getting suddenly dragged into something like that.

name: Me
text: Yeah, we had a hell of a time.

name: Masked Madam
text: To be honest, even I was surprised. I wasn't thinking he'd move so quickly.
The masked lady said and sat down across from us.

name: Me
text: Do you know what's going on?
The masked lady was not our enemy, but that didn't mean that she was our ally. We had to keep in mind that this could be a trap.

name: Masked Madam
text: Don't be in such a hurry, Captain.

name: Masked Madam
text: We'll be safe here for a while. Let's have a cup of tea and calm down first.
The Masked Madam rang the bell and a waitress appeared as though she had been standing at the ready.

name: Masked Madam
text: What would you two over there like to drink?

name: Hebiko
text: Eh, Hebiko and Shikanosuke too? Th-Then... Hebiko will have an orange juice.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Thank you, Mask Lady!! I'll have a cream soda then!!

name: Masked Madam
text: Mask La-!? ...Hehe, alright. I'll order for you.
The masked lady nodded with a menacing smile and ordered the drinks from the waitress.

name: Me
text: Shikanosuke... you have no regard for your own life.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Eh? What are you talking about? I've been running around for so long, I'm parched.
As I whispered to him, Shikanosuke tilted his head with a puzzled look on his face.

name: Me
text: (He's a scaredy-cat, but in this kind of situation he acts like a daredevil...)
After having received our order, the waitress confirmed that everything was correct, asked us to wait a moment, and then left the room.

name: Masked Madam
text: Alright then.
The masked lady cleared her throat softly and turned to face us.

name: Masked Madam
text: Let's cut to the chase. I'll tell you what you want to know.

name: Me
text: Okay... First, tell me the true significance of the "cargo" I transported, and then about the "client."

name: Me
text: ーYou said that this "client" is Gaiza, right? What the hell is that guy trying to do?

name: Masked Madam
text: What do you think?

name: Me
text: I... honestly, I can't say for sure because I don't have enough information, but...

name: Masked Madam
text: That's alright, let me hear what you think.

name: Me
text: I think the "cargo" we transported was a diversion.

name: Me
text: Which means that the client's real target was something else, and that he was secretly working toward his real target while we were carrying the cargo as a diversion.

name: Me
text: ーThat's what I think.
The contents of the "cargo" had been useless junk, and the destination had been a company that seemed to have nothing to do with the whole situation.
To this I added the points that the masked lady had made, and this was the guess I had come up with.
The masked lady stared at me for a moment, and thenー

name: Masked Madam
text: You're right, Captain. So that's why "she" likes you so much.

name: Me
text: "She?"

name: Masked Madam
text: Hehe, it's nothing.
The masked lady vaguely shook her head.

name: Masked Madam
text: In any case... you're right. The "cargo" was just a diversion.

name: Masked Madam
text: What the "client" really wanted was secretly transported separatelyーand is now being scattered all over the city.

name: Me
text: Scatteredー!?
I pondered the meaning of those words for a moment, and then came to a frightening answer that sent chills down my spine.

name: Me
text: D-Don't tell meー Those Zombiesー

name: Masked Madam
text: Exactly. That was Nisha Gaiza's doing.

name: Me
text: No way...!

name: Masked Madam
text: Creeping Death Virus... the CD Virus for short.

name: Masked Madam
text: It is a vicious virus that, if inhaled once, destroys the body and mind, and turns the person into a Zombie that will attack anything that moves.

name: Masked Madam
text: UFS researchers and sorcerers have been working together to secretly develop this technology, and at last they succeeded in putting it into practical useー

name: Masked Madam
text: But the effects were so heinous that it was sealed up tightly within the UFS.

name: Masked Madam
text: That's what Nisha Gaiza got his hands on. Or more accurately, gas bombs full of the CD Virus.
And Gaiza had acted immediately.
He had detonated the CD Virus bombs in various parts of the city, a heinous act of terrorism.
That "white haze" we had seen had been the gas from the bombs, the gas containing the CD Virus.

name: Me
text: Wha-...

name: Me
text: B-But for what!? What the hell does Gaiza want...!?

name: Me
text: Is he going so far as to try to destroy Tokyo Kingdom!? No matter how you think about it, it's ridiculous!

name: Masked Madam
text: He's got a goal in mind. His aim is to acquire the territory of "Dragon Gate," the group that controls this district.

name: Masked Madam
text: It seems that he and Nomad have a secret agreement. For quite some time now, Dragon Gate and Nomad have been engaged in a power struggle here in Tokyo Kingdom.

name: Masked Madam
text: If he manages to take care of the opposing forces and reduces their power, giving him one or two territories is a small price to payー. I guess that's what Nomad is thinking.

name: Me
text: Nomadーas expected. But biological weapons in a war between underground organizations...?
"Dragon Gate" was a Chinese criminal organization whose power was comparable to Nomad. With his current power, Gaiza would be no match for them.

name: Me
text: (So that's why Gaiza chose to use a heinous weapon like the CD Virus...?)

name: Masked Madam
text: Gas bombs exploded only around Dragon Gate offices and facilities.

name: Masked Madam
text: With this much chaos, even the tightly guarded Dragon Gate facilities could easily be infiltrated.

name: Me
text: So what you're asking of me is to stop Gaiza from attacking Dragon Gate?

name: Masked Madam
text: Hehe, no, no. It's already too late for that. By now, he must have already accomplished his purpose. He acted much faster than I expected.

name: Me
text:
So Dragon Gate...
<ACTOR>0,k_t003f,CENTER, CENTER, NONE, linear, 0

name: Masked Madam
text: By now, they must've already had their throats slit by Nisha Gaiza, who used the chaos to break in.

name: Masked Madam
text: The job I want you to do is to "stop the next step."

name: Me
text: The next step?

name: Masked Madam
text: I want you to get them out of his hands. The remainder of the gas bombs with the CD Virus.
At that moment, there was a knock on the door of the private room.

name: Waitress
text: Madam... I-have-brought-your-order...

name: Masked Madam
text: Thanks, I'll open the door. ーPerfect timing. Have a drink and slowly think about your decision.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Oh! I'll get the door! I got nervous hearing the super heavy story and my throat got all dry.
Shikanosuke got up and went to open the door.
*Click*ー

name: Waitress
text: Sorry-to-keep-you-waiting...

name: Shikanosuke
text: No worries! Thank you, miss...
Shikanosuke took the tray with the drinks and exchanged looks with... the zombified waitress.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieeeeeee!!?? Agaaaaaaaaaaaaain!!!
*CRASH!*
Shikanosuke flipped the tray over and as if reacting to the soundー

name: Zombie Waitress
text: MOUNGGGGGHHHHH!!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh!!!

name: Me
text: Stop it, Shikanosuke! If you provoke them, you'll end upー

name: Zombie Waiters
text:
▪ Did-you-call-for-me...?
▪ Please-wait-a-moment...

name: Me
text: Look what you've dooone!!
From behind the Zombie Waitress, the other employees were gathering in droves. They were all Zombies, of course.

name: Masked Madam
text: Damn! The damage is more widespread than I thought. Take this, quickly.

name: Me
text: What's this? A vaccine?

name: Masked Madam
text: Inject it right away. It'll keep you from turning into a Zombie, even if you were to inhale the virus.
The masked lady handed us a small ampoule.
Every biological weapon had a vaccine designed to prevent it from harming allies.

name: Masked Madam
text: Akitsu, can I ask a favor?

name: Akitsu
text: Alright, alright. So it's finally my turn.
Akitsu, who had been looking bored standing guard behind the masked lady, slowly stepped forward.

name: Akitsu
text: Okay, bring it on!

name: Zombie Waitress
text: MOUNGGGHHHHH!!!
